channel.title: Midi clock without transport control?
channel.description: I am wondering if the Axoloti could be used as a midi filter to remove the start/stop messages but let the midi clock through. When I push start on the drum machine or external sequencer my Mother 32 starts its sequence. I would prefer the M32 to sync with external gear but wait for me to tell it when specifically to play the sequence. Is this possible?

item.title: Midi clock without transport control?
item.dc:creator: @Dolphinwolf Jeffrey David Anderson
item.description:
@Dolphinwolf wrote:

I am wondering if the Axoloti could be used as a midi filter to remove the start/stop messages but let the midi clock through. When I push start on the drum machine or external sequencer my Mother 32 starts its sequence. I would prefer the M32 to sync with external gear but wait for me to tell it when specifically to play the sequence. Is this possible?
